title: Stuck in ranked Que
body:
stuck in ranked champion select ATM and nothings happening its just broke. In promotions and dont want to leave 

Assistance pls

replies.body: there servers have crashed mate.. just wait and someone will let you know when it is fixed.. ranked Ques will probly be disabled and the match u were in or about to be in will be wiped from the system.. so wont loose points etc..  last time this happened was like 2 weeks ago.. and took about 20-30 mins before they fixed it. just be paitent..
